arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1732233450000_d3e4f5g6h", "workspaceId": "ws_1732233450000_i7j8k9l0m", "sessionDescription": "Writing FAQ", "sessionMemory": "Creating frequently asked questions document", "toolContext": "Create FAQ", "primaryGoal": "Document common questions", "subgoal": "Write FAQ"}, "filePath": "Docs/FAQ.md", "content": "# Frequently Asked Questions

## Getting Started

**Q: How do I create an account?**
A: Click Sign Up and fill out the registration form.

**Q: How do I reset my password?**
A: Use the Forgot Password link on the login page.

## Features

**Q: How do I export my data?**
A: Go to Settings > Export Data."}
